description:
Installation of three dual polar antenna on tripod mounted poles and one equipment cabin on the roof. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  21131.004/01, 21131.03.150/01,                         21131.03.100/01.  Specifications and                         supporting statement.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposal, by reason of its prominent siting and poor design is considered to be a discordant, visually intrusive and alien feature in the street scene and would have an unacceptable adverse impact on the siting of the adjacent Grade II Listed Building and would neither preserve or enhance the character or appearance on the Canonbury and Highbury Park Conservation Areas of which the site fringes, contrary to policies Env1 and D1 of the Council's Revised Unitary Development Plan 2000 and Islington's Conservation Area Design Guidelines 2000.
